model.name: DNA DENIM JACKET
model.disambiguatingDescription: This DNA Denim Jacket twists the classic design with a distinctive square collar. Cut in a regular fit, it features tone-on-tone distorted metallic hardware and a VVN leather label on the back with signed palladium staples. Attached with a black snap hook, its removable denim Louis Vuitton Staples Edition label coordinates perfectly with the slim jeans.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 100% Cotton
  • Lining : 100% Cotton
  • Black
  • Regular Fit
  • Based on a size 48 : Back length 64,7 cm/25,4 in; Shoulder width 47,5 cm/18,7 in; Waist 106,8cm/42,0 in; Sleeve length 66,8 cm/26,2 in
  • Model wear a FR 48 size
  • Model measurements : chest 36’’ / 92 cm, height 6'2’’ / 188 cm.
  • Made in Japan
